thread.title: Thai celebrates 55 years with network-wide sale
thread.title_full: Thai celebrates 55 years with network-wide sale

author: Sudipto Roy
title: Thai celebrates 55 years with network-wide sale
text:
"We are currently updating our website and doing maintenance. We apologize for the inconvenience." 3 Home » AIRLINE NEWS » Thai celebrates 55 years with network-wide sale Thai celebrates 55 years with network-wide sale Published on : Thursday, July 2, 2015 
THAI Celebrates 55 years with a network-wide sale to popular destinations in Thailand, Indochina, India and Europe. Fares start from just $796 return per person for a Companion Fare deal to Thailand. Individual fares to Thailand to start from $812 return. 



Book by 31 August ’15, travel until 30 November ’15. Seasonal surcharges apply to some departure dates and to some destinations. 


Fares are available for travel from Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane or Perth to Bangkok with onward connections to all the most popular destinations within Thailand, to Vietnam, Laos and Cambodia, the Indian Subcontinent and to Europe. 


Travellers can upgrade and travel in THAI’s Royal Silk Business Class with fares for individual travellers and further discounts for travel in twos with Companion deals starting from $3,472 return to Thailand. Related Posts
